author: starwarsgeek101_
title: Excellent
review: This set is very nice and is a good addition set to a soccer collection. The green piece holding the soccer player tends to move to much and cannot stay in one place. It's accuracy is pretty off too. This is good set overall at a low price.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Football) - Point Shooting Review
review:
This set is one of the smallest LEGO Sports (Football) sets I have now. It almost doesn't have any play features but it's still a good little set to have. The only play feature we get here is the catapult which shoots the ball in one of the 3 holes. The built is very nice and easy and it's also a great little set for pieces which you can use for brickfilms and/or MOC's (My own creations).

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Stopmotion
Review

author: Flash88
title: Practice makes perfect
review:
Quite a good novelty set this, although not sure how much play you'll get out of it.

Simply a case of firing the ball through the holes, ala the players on the Championship Challenge pitch. Don't see how you can't replicate this simply by practising in the goal.

Might be a good travel piece if you are going anywhere, but certainly not something you'd play if you had alternatives.
